decisions.description: Checks to see if item is active and first needs reactivating.
decisions.name: Active_Check_Multi_to_Single
decisions.label: Active Check

decisions.description: Checks to see if item is active and first needs reactivating.
decisions.name: Active_Check_Quick_Action
decisions.label: Active Check

decisions.description: Checks to see if item is active and first needs reactivating.
decisions.name: Active_Check_Single_Global
decisions.label: Active Check

decisions.description: Checks if the item is appendix 1/personal issue as Team Leaders are only authorised to move this category of equipment.
decisions.name: Category_Permission_Check
decisions.label: Category Permission Check

decisions.description: Checks if the item is appendix 1/personal issue as Team Leaders are only authorised to move this category of equipment.
decisions.name: Category_Permission_Check_Multi
decisions.label: Category Permission Check

decisions.description: Checks if a Serialised Product is found where the ENID entered matches ENID field.
decisions.name: Check_If_Individual_ENID_Serialised_Product_Found
decisions.label: Check If Individual ENID Serialised Product Found

decisions.description: Checks if a Serialised Product is found where the ENID entered matches Parent ENID field.
decisions.name: Check_If_Parent_ENID_Serialised_Product_Found
decisions.label: Check If Parent ENID Serialised Product Found

decisions.description: Checks if the item is being moved from a Quarantine area and status is being changed to available. This should be done via an Inspection rather than manual move.
decisions.name: check_Move_Validity
decisions.label: Check Move Validity

rules.name: Invalid_Return_Booked_Out_Move_Quick
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 3 AND 4) OR (3 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)) OR (4 AND 9 AND 10)
rules.label: Invalid Return Booked Out Move - Quick

rules.name: Invalid_Quarantine_Status_Change1
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4) OR ((5 OR 6 OR 7) AND 8)
rules.label: Invalid Quarantine Status Change

rules.name: Inspection_Due_Quick
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8)
rules.label: Inspection Due - Quick

rules.name: Non_Quarantine_Move_Quick
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Non Quarantine Move - Quick

decisions.description: Checks if the item is being moved from a Quarantine area and status is being changed to available. This should be done via an Inspection rather than manual move.
decisions.name: check_Move_Validity1
decisions.label: Check Move Validity

rules.name: Invalid_Returned_Book_Out_Move_Global
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 3 AND 4) OR (3 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)) OR (4 AND 9 AND 10)
rules.label: Invalid Returned Book Out Move - Global

rules.name: Invalid_Quarantine_Change
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4) OR ((5 OR 6 OR 7) AND 8)
rules.label: Invalid Quarantine Change

rules.name: Inspection_Due_Global
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8)
rules.label: Inspection Due - Global

decisions.description: Checks if all permission set Ids were located, and also if the user has a permission set assignment for any of the permission sets.
decisions.name: Permission_Set_Assignment_Check
decisions.label: Permission Set Assignment Check

decisions.description: Checks whether the flow has been invoked from a Quick Action or a Global Action.
decisions.name: Quick_Action_or_Global_Action

screens.description: Screen to manually capture the ENID for the equipment due to being invoked from a global action.
screens.name: CaptureENIDScreen
screens.label: Capture ENID Screen

fields.name: ENID_Entry_Text
fields.fieldText: Input or Scan Energy Networks ID:

screens.description: Confirms to the user the update has been carried out as required.
screens.name: Confirmation_Screen
screens.label: Confirmation Screen

fields.name: ConfirmationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: The below item(s) are now updated:

screens.description: Screen to allow the user to confirm what status and location they wish to change to.
screens.name: Enter_Status_Location_Change_Screen
screens.label: Enter Status & Location Change Screen

fields.name: Display_Energy_Networks_ID
fields.fieldText: Energy Networks ID: {!recordId.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

fields.name: Display_Dual_ID
fields.fieldText:
Energy Networks ID: {!recordId.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Parent Energy Networks ID: {!recordId.SPEN_Parent_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

fields.name: StatusLocationChangeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You can choose to change both the item status and location below:

fields.name: action_Booking_Type
fields.fieldText: Action

fields.name: Item_Status_Picklist
fields.fieldText: Change Item Status

fields.name: transfercommentsInput1
fields.fieldText: Reason

fields.name: Change_Location
fields.fieldText: Change Location

fields.name: Display_text_screen1
fields.fieldText: This equipment is part of a multiset, if you wish to update all items in the set, please tick the box below.

fields.name: Update_All_Checkbox_Multiset
fields.fieldText: Update All

screens.description: Screen to allow the user to confirm what status and location they wish to change to.
screens.name: Enter_Status_Location_Change_Screen_Multiset
screens.label: Enter Status & Location Change Screen

fields.name: StatusLocationChangeDisplayText_Multi
fields.fieldText:

You can choose to change both the item status and location below:

fields.name: action_Type_Picklist2
fields.fieldText: Action

fields.name: Item_Status_Picklist_Global
fields.fieldText: Change Item Status

fields.name: TransferCommentsInput
fields.fieldText: Reason

fields.name: Change_Location_Global
fields.fieldText: Change Location

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Display_text_screen1
fields.fieldText: You have scanned a parent Energy Networks ID, please confirm if you wish to update all active items?

fields.name: Update_Option_Picklist
fields.fieldText: Update Option

fields.name: Energy_Networks_ID_Individual_Update
fields.fieldText: Energy Networks ID

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run the flow.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Set_Check_Screen
screens.label: Failed Permission Set Check Screen

fields.name: NotAuthorisedDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to manually change item status/location.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run the flow.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Set_Check_Screen_Compliance_Category
screens.label: Failed Permission Set Check Screen

fields.name: NotAuthorisedDisplayTextComplianceCategory
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to manually change item status/location, this is because the category is not appendix 1/personal issue.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Confirms to user that the item needs reactivating first before it status/location can be updated.
screens.name: Inactive_Single_Item_Confirmation_Screen
screens.label: Inactive Single Item Confirmation

fields.name: inactiveItemDisplayTextGlobalSingle
fields.fieldText:
This equipment is currently inactive and will need to be reactivated prior to updating status/location.


If you are unable to reactivate, please request this action from a member of the compliance team.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to users they are attempting to move an item sat in quarantine - awaiting inspection to a non quarantine location.
screens.name: Inspection_Due_Screen
screens.label: Inspection Due Screen

fields.name: InspectionDueDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to move a quarantined item that is awaiting an inspection. Please complete an inspection to change the status or location.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the ENID entered is not valid/doesn't match a Serialised Product record.
screens.name: Invalid_ENID_Screen
screens.label: Invalid ENID Screen

fields.name: InvalidENIDDisplayText
fields.fieldText: The chosen Energy Networks ID is not valid. Please input or scan an ID that matches a valid item.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to users they are attempting to move an item to a quarantine status but to a non quarantine location.
screens.name: Invalid_Quarantine_Move_Screen
screens.label: Invalid Quarantine Move Screen

fields.name: InvalidQuarantineChange
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to change the item to a quarantine status but are moving to a non quarantine location. Please go back to amend the location details.

fields.name: InvalidQuarantineStatusChange
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to change the item to a non quarantine status and are moving to a quarantine location. Please go back to amend the location details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to users they are attempting to move an item back to booked out following return from calibration/repair but the location chose is not of user type.
screens.name: Invalid_Return_Book_Out_Move_Screen
screens.label: Invalid Return Book Out Move Screen

fields.name: InvalidReturnBookOutStatusChangeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to change the item to booked out, but the chosen destination is not a user location.

fields.name: InvalidBookOutStatusChangeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to change the item to booked out, please use the book out process.

fields.name: InvalidIssueItemStatusChangeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to change the item to booked out, please use the issue item process.

fields.name: InvalidQuarantinedBookOutStatusChangeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to change the item to booked out but the equipment is quarantined.

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Location is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Location_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Location Record Type Screen

fields.name: MissingLocationRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot move item status/location at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Location object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the system is missing permission sets, these need to be uploaded before the flow can be ran.
screens.name: Missing_Permission_Sets_Screen
screens.label: Missing Permission Sets Screen

fields.name: MissingPermissionSetsDisplay
fields.fieldText:
There are missing permissions in the system to check you are authorised. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


One of the below custom permissions are missing in the Salesforce system:


  • Compliance Team
  • Operational Safety Engineer
  • Site Manager
  • Team Leader

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Product Transfers is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Product_Transfer_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Product Transfer Record Type Screen

fields.name: MissingProductTransferRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot move item status/location for this equipment. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product Transfer object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Serialised Products is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Serialised_Product_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Serialised Product Record Type Screen

fields.name: MissingSerialisedProductRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot move item status/location at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Serialised Product object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm to users they are attempting to move an item sat in quarantine - awaiting inspection to a non quarantine location.
screens.name: Non_Quarantine_Move_Screen
screens.label: Non Quarantine Move Screen

fields.name: NonQuarantineDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to move a quarantined item to a non quarantine location. Please go back to amend the location details.

variables.description: Variable to store the new owner ID for Serialised Product.
variables.name: assigned_owner_Id

variables.description: Holds the assigned product transfer details prior to being entered in product transfer collection
variables.name: assigned_product_transfer

variables.description: Stores the new assigned variables for product transfer state records to be generated.
variables.name: assigned_Product_Transfer_State

variables.description: Stores the new fields for Serialised Product being updated in the flow.
variables.name: assignedSerialisedProduct

variables.description: Stores all the product transfers to be generated via the flow.
variables.name: finalProductTransfers

variables.description: Record collection variable to store all Product Transfer State records to be generated.
variables.name: finalProductTransferStates

variables.description: Stores all Serialised Product records to be updated.
variables.name: finalSerialisedProducts

variables.description: Stores the updated Product Transfer records to be updated.
variables.name: finalUpdatedProductTransfers

variables.description: Populates if the user enters a location ID and it brings back a record which is a quarantine location.
variables.name: QuarantineLocationId

variables.description: Stores the Serialised Product record which the flow has been invoked from when applicable via Quick Action, stores the Serialised Product assigned when user chooses via ENID if invoked via Global Action.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores all the record Ids of the multiset.
variables.name: recordidscollection

variables.description: Stores the new variables to update the created Product Transfer records.
variables.name: updated_product_transfers
